aspectran.description: | | {{bold}}--- Demonstrating the Scheduler Sample Application ---{{bold:off}} | |{{underline}}Built-in commands for this console application:{{underline:off}} | {{green}}desc on{{fg:off}} - Prints a description of the command each time the command is executed | {{green}}desc off{{fg:off}} - Turns off print a description of the command each time the command is executed | {{green}}help{{fg:off}} - Prints help for the available commands that was displayed at startup | {{green}}restart{{fg:off}} - Restarts this console application | {{green}}mem{{fg:off}} - Shows memory usage | {{green}}gc{{fg:off}} - Performs a garbage collection | {{green}}quit{{fg:off}} - Exits from this console application |
